name: Get Prepped
description:
Worked on a team of 3 to develop this JavaScript-based SAT prep app for Microsoft Surface. I implemented the vocabulary flashcards feature that allows users to study the definitions of 1000 words by pulling them from a remote Parse database, then saving the user's progress locally. In addition, I implemented much of the front-end interactions and styling, including the navigation bar, which features submenu panels that animate by unfolding in an overlay.

Get Prepped was featured in the Microsoft Surface Pro 3 announcement in May 2014 (skip to 9:56).
